thread.title: Brexit won't hit ties, says China, as May seeks trade

title: Brexit won't hit ties, says China, as May seeks trade
text:
Brexit won't hit ties, says China, as May seeks trade 12:06pm EST - 01:45 
China's relations with Britain will remain unchanged through Brexit, Premier Li Keqiang said on Wednesday, as British Prime Minister Theresa May kicked off a three-day visit to China, where she aims to sign nine billion pounds in deals. David Pollard reports.   
China's relations with Britain will remain unchanged through Brexit, Premier Li Keqiang said on Wednesday, as British Prime Minister Theresa May kicked off a three-day visit to China, where she aims to sign nine billion pounds in deals. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2nuXhjX
